plot outline: A psychological thriller which throws light on the issues happening in Namma Bengaluru, resulting in non Kannadigas in the city going amiss. To investigate the missing people, a senior crime inspector is appointed and her techniques of investigation is highlighted. The main motto (moral) behind the whole plot is, " To build an environment in the State to not disrespect any language". When you're in Bengaluru, respect Kannada and likewise with any other city/state.
title: Kannad Gothilla
plot: A mysterious tale of non-Kannadiga immigrants going missing in Bengaluru. What happened to them?

A psychological thriller which throws light on the issues happening in Namma Bengaluru, resulting in non Kannadigas in the city going amiss. To investigate the missing people, a senior crime inspector is appointed and her techniques of investigation is highlighted. The main motto (moral) behind the whole plot is, " To build an environment in the State to not disrespect any language". When you're in Bengaluru, respect Kannada and likewise with any other city/state.::Mayuraa Raghavendra
